case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Jack Mandelbaum

opinions.opinion_text: Judgment of the County Court, Kings County, convicting defendant of the crime of robbery in the first degree, unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Present — Lewis, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Johnston and Adel, JJ. [See 272 App. Div. 824.]

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
